question: Which among the following is correct about Heliopause?
option1: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which Light from Sun can not reach
option2: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which heat from Sun can not reach
option3: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which Solar Winds can not reach
option4: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which there is no existence of Solar system
answer: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which Solar Winds can not reach
explanation: Heliopose is the theoretical boundary beyond which Solar Winds can not reach. The heliosphere is the vast, bubble-like region of space which surrounds and is created by the Sun.
